features: Made With Quality, Organic Whey Protein: Baby’s Only Gentle Organic Toddler Formula is formulated with an organic whey toddler protein powder to support digestion.

Complete And Balanced Nutrition For Optimal Growth: Our Gentle Formula offers a blend of organic soybean oil, organic high oleic sunflower oil, safflower oil, and organic coconut oil. Organic soybean oil is an excellent source of unsaturated fats to help support good growth and development, while organic, non-GMO soybean oil helps ensure your child gets the appropriate balance of essential fatty acids.

Give Your Toddler A Better Start To Life: We know how important it is to give your toddler only high-quality, organic ingredients. Our classic toddler formula with whey protein is free of corn syrup, palm oil, and hexane-processed DHA, so you can feel confident you're providing your little one with a formula powder with clean ingredients.
Superior Nutrition For Your Little One: Our organic formula is intended for toddlers 1 year and older or as directed by a healthcare professional.
We're Committed To Purity: Your little one means the world to you, and that means the world to us. That’s why we hold every product we create to the highest purity and quality standards possible.
body.description: Baby's Only Gentle Organic Toddler Formula is carefully crafted with organic ingredients to provide the best for your little one.The inclusion of organic whey protein in this baby formula creates a formula that is gentle and easier to digest. . Our Gentle Formula also goes beyond the benefits of organic whey protein. This toddler formula recipe also contains a mix of high-quality nutrients.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Baby’s Only Organic Formula is: Organic* Non-GMO No Hexane Processed DHA Rated "Best In Class" by the Clean Label Project ‡ No Corn Syrup or Palm Oil Added Iron Fortified Kosher † * (One-34-190104-H-NOP,by OneCert, 2019) ‡ (INF0001-2017G-31, by CLP, 2017 † (OUD3-27C7C12,by KCS, 2019) Baby’s Only Organic Formula Baby’s Only Formulas are created to include all the essential nutrients - like proteins, healthy fats, carbohydrates, and vitamins - your little one needs to get the best possible start… for life! We have formulas designed to help EVERY child thrive. Whether your family is dealing with food sensitivities, needs a plant-based option, or is looking for the best quality dairy-based formula on the market, we have an organic formula that will fit your needs. And, we go beyond regulatory requirements by testing our formula ingredients for heavy metals and other contaminants that could be detrimental to your baby’s health.

Organic Premium Infant Formula Organic Sensitive DHA/ARA Toddler Formula Organic Plant Based Pea Protein Toddler Formula Organic Dairy DHA/ARA Toddler Formula Organic Gentle DHA/ARA Toddler Formula Goat Milk DHA/ARA Toddler Formula Certified Organic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Clean Label Project Purity Award ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Includes an Organic, Non-Hexane Extracted Source of DHA & ARA ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Dairy-Based ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Plant-Based / Vegetarian ✓ No Soy Protein ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Lactose Sensitivity ✓ ✓ Milk Protein Intolerance ✓ Galactosemia ✓ May Support Softer Stools † ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This formula is great!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We used this for our daughter 6 years ago and she did so well on it. Now her youngest brother has been on it after turning 1 and he loves it! Definitely recommend trying it for your toddler!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I feel good about giving to my baby
reviews.reviewText: This really is a superb product. I chose the whey protein because it seems to closely match that of breastmilk. Of course, nothing truly compares to breastmilk but this is one of the best formulas. Prior to choosing Babys Only Whey Protein my 4 month old (he started at 3 months) son went through formula after formula. I'm struggling with a low supply so I have to supplement. He was having constipation, gassy, fussy and I felt bad for him. I went through everything...Similac, Gerber, Enfamil. Variations of different brands...gentle, organic, etc. Nothing helped. He's been on this about 3 weeks or so. No problems. His bowel movements are regular again, no more crying and it apparently tastes good because he doesn't push it out with his tongue like he did with some of the others. Also this doesn't have a smell...some of the others we tried did. The only issue is the price. You can find this on the Nature One website for $14.99 plus shipping which totals about $19 so I was comfortable purchasing it from Amazon since I have prime. The price was $19.08 with 2 day shipping so I was getting it faster. However, the price is raising...it's gone up to $21....no sir....no ma'am. I shall not pay inflation price. I was considering one of the other kinds of Babys Only like Dairy or the DHA since they are cheaper, although I really want to stick with Whey. That's when I discovered from one of the reviews that you can purchase at Whole Foods...I didn't know that. I called my local Whole Foods and sure enough they have it. Bonus: they have the Whey Protein and it's $12.99!!! I will no longer purchase from Amazon and their high price. If they dropped it to a reasonable price that's on point to how much the original manufacturer sells it for then I would buy from Amazon but until then...off to Whole Foods I go!!! So happy that the price is CHEAPER! This is a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Yes, the formula is a bit expensive and the can is pretty small.. BUT I feel confident and happy to give this formula to my baby. I do everything I can to give my daughter all I have when it comes to breastfeeding. But because of a health condition, it breaks my heart to say I'm not able to exclusively bf. After hours and hours of research THIS is the BEST formula in USA to give your child. Less chemicals and unnecessary toxins compared to many other leading brands. Ill pay the extra penny to make sure my child gets the better option. The delivery came on time, the bag was a little tore, so I wish the padding was thicker, but can and everything came undented and I felt safe giving to her. THANK YOU BABYS ONLY FOR CREATING THIS FORMULA!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You only get one can for this price, not six (as the customer answers falsely advertise)!!!
reviews.reviewText: The formula itself is excellent. In fact, some consider Baby's Only with whey protein the best available organic formula, even above the European formulas Holle and Hipp. HOWEVER, six different "customer answers" state that you get 6 cans for this price, which I must say seemed too good to be true. (I pay about $12 a can for another version of Baby's Only at Whole Foods.) But with 6 different customers saying that you get 6 cans for this price, I was led to believe I was getting a great deal. FALSE! YOU ONLY GET ONE CAN FOR $15!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2016
reviews.reviewText: We switched to this formula with the whey protein when my daughter was having a difficult time digesting the Dairy with DHA & RHA formula. She was having terrible gas, hard stools and was rather cranky from the discomfort. Within 2 days of switching we noticed an immediate improvement; she was comfortable and her stools were soft and "normal" as they should look.We chose this brand when I was unable to breastfeed, and began giving it to our daughter early on. We tried other organic brands before trying this one as we thought it was only used for toddlers, but after further research found that nutritionally this was completely safe for our daughter. Unfortunately there are many brands of formulas out there that use questionable ingredients, but I take comfort in knowing we're doing what's best for our daughter by giving her the closest thing to breast milk that we can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tried and failed my toddler couldn't handle it
reviews.reviewText: Since my daughter stopped infant formula she hasn't been able to stick to one type of milk and when I finally got her to take NAN there is a formula shortage. We tried this formula but unfortunately it didn't work for her it made her stool really loose throughout the whole time she was on the formula

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing. So glad we found this formula.
reviews.reviewText: We did so much research to find the right formula to supplement. It took us weeks to figure out that we wanted to go with Nature One and no one else. The whey protein has been AMAZING for our daughter. We started her on just the dairy version, but switched to this based off of other people's experiences and issues with constipation and gas. I will say that one poster broke it down for me in a review about how this formula needs to be measured out properly and that was a lifesaver. The amount in one scoop can vary depending on who serves it, and when the scoop is too full it can weigh out to be 10 grams and even 11. The serving amount should be 8.5 grams and that's it. If the ratio is off ... it'll most likely lead to constipation. We went and bought a kitchen scale to help with this. A lot more effort but the company is so worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No tummy issues
reviews.reviewText: This formula keeps my 6 month old son regular! It has been hard to find a formula that doesn’t back him up and cause gas but we’ve had no issues with this one. It has been great to supplement breastmilk with!
